name: Schrodinger's cat Dead or Alive ??
description:
Controls :  W,A,S,D  to move the Cat
                       and  E,  to intereact  , SPACE to Jump
.................................


BYOGG 2022 Submission by Pulkit Rathore
I took the theme  "Its not supposed to do that" and made a game  based on Schrödinger's cat thought full experiment.
In quantum mechanics, Schrödinger's cat is a thought experiment that illustrates a paradox of quantum superposition. In the thought experiment, a hypothetical cat may be considered simultaneously both alive and dead as a result of its fate being linked to a random subatomic event that may or may not occur.


Concept of the game : Dr. doing the Experiment with the cat in the cardboard box. but cat make itself free from the box and run away from the window of the room.
and then dr tries to catch it.
later cat realize that a big hammer hung on the crane which can be fall on the poisionous gas after the explode of radio active.
and yup this is what the Schrödinger's cat arrangement in the box.
so its mean the cat is still in big box . as it come the big box that it our world then further we see that a box is kept on the table and it is vibrating. its mean the Universe is spliting with the no. of choices  of the cat .ie dead, alive.......
